DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether school garden affect child 's physical activity .
DOC.detailed_description: New York State school randomly assign receive school garden associate curriculum serve wait list control group receive garden curriculum end 2-year study . Baseline data collect Fall 2011 . Garden intervention begin Spring 2012 . Follow-up data collect 6 , 12 , 18 month follow baseline data collection .
DOC.criteria: school least 50 % enrolled child qualify free + reduce price meal ( FRPM ) school already school garden
